SEARCH
Package acsse.csc2a.nova.models

Class SolarSystem

java.lang.Object
acsse.csc2a.nova.models.SolarSystem
public class SolarSystem extends Object
Represents a solar system that contains multiple celestial bodies.

A SolarSystem has a name and maintains an array of CelestialBody objects. It supports adding new celestial bodies and dynamically expands the internal storage as needed.

Version:
P05
Author:
Mr. Orfao

  • Constructor Details

    • SolarSystem

      public SolarSystem(String name)
      Constructs a SolarSystem with a given name and an initial capacity for celestial bodies.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the solar system
      numBodies - the initial capacity for celestial bodies in the solar system

  • Method Details

    • addBody

      public void addBody(CelestialBody newBody)
      Adds a new celestial body to the solar system.

      If the internal array reaches its capacity, it is expanded by one slot to accommodate additional bodies.

      Parameters:
      newBody - the celestial body to be added

    • getBodyFromName

      public CelestialBody getBodyFromName(String name)
      Retrieves a celestial body from the solar system by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the celestial body to search for
      Returns:
      the CelestialBody with the matching name, or null if not found

    • getName

      public String getName()

    • getCelestialBodies

      public ArrayList<CelestialBody> getCelestialBodies()

    • countCelestialBodies

      public int countCelestialBodies()
      Counts the number of CelestialBodies present in the SolarSystem.
      Returns:
      the number of Bodies present in the SolarSystem.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string representation of the solar system and its celestial bodies.

      The string begins with the solar system's name, followed by each celestial body's details on a new line.

      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string containing the solar system name and its celestial bodies
